inclusion.criterion: HCV RNA positive on quantitative test
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Liver biopsy within one year before entry
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Fibrosis score of at least 2/6 according to Ishak et al (1995)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Abstainer, light drinker or moderate drinker
inclusion.label: met

notes: 55-year-old man diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago and recent coinfection with HBV. No evidence of alcoholic liver disease, bleeding from esophageal varices, hemochromatosis, autoimmune hepatitis, or metabolic liver disease.
